price: Nokorɛ sɛ nkwaseafoͻ bi a εwͻ yεn mu no twa nkontompo a εborosoᴐ paa de to Nyankopͻn so.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna yaqūlu safīhunā ʿalā al-lahi shaṭaṭan
